fixes.name: Calculation1
fixes.dax_expression:
IF('Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Furniture", "furniture",
IF('Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Office Supplies", "office supplier",
IF('Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Technology", "technology",
'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category])))
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF / ELSEIF chain into nested DAX IF statements. This is row-level string mapping so it is implemented as a calculated column and references the Category column as 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category].
